body.query: *|bucket datehistorgram(@timestamp) interval=1m timezone='Asia/Shanghai' mindoccount=1 as 3|stats count(日志等级.keyword) as 日志等级.keyword_count by 3
body.outline: transform field(日志等级.keyword_count) by 3|distribution normal(日志等级.keyword_count) by 3
body.fit: *|outlier sigma(FF_日志等级.keyword_count) method=std para=1 windows=1 as result by 3

TestCase1.Description: 正常场景:提交单维度异常检测任务

TestCase2.Description: 正常场景:提交多维度异常检测任务

TestCase3.Description: 正常场景:提交时间序列预测任务

TestCase4.Description: 正常场景:提交根因分析任务
